# python-class

```
[distutils]
index-servers =
    pypi
    testpypi
    private-repository

[pypi]
username = __token__
password = <PyPI token>

[testpypi]
username = __token__
password = <TestPyPI token>

[private-repository]
repository = <private-repository URL>
username = <private-repository username>
password = <private-repository password>
```
